cs213.photoAlbum.model

Interface AlbumInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Album

    public interface AlbumInterface
    Methods for a photo album with a name as well as a HashMap of photos.
    Author:
    Ben Green

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for album's name
        Returns:
        Album's name

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Getter for album's size
        Returns:
        Number of photos in the album

      • getPhotos

        java.util.Collection<Photo> getPhotos()
        Getter for album's photos
        Returns:
        Collection of album's photos, duplicated to protect the original HashMap

      • getPhoto

        Photo getPhoto(java.lang.String filename)
        Retrieves photo from album
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to search for
        Returns:
        Photo object or null if said photo does not exist

        Add photo to album
        Parameters:
        photo - Photo to add

      • deletePhoto

        void deletePhoto(java.lang.String filename)
        Delete photo from album
        Parameters:
        filename - Photo to delete

      • hasPhoto

        boolean hasPhoto(java.lang.String filename)
        Searches album for photo by filename
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to search for
        Returns:
        True or False, depending on if the photo exists
